thread.section_title: Reuters: Financial Services and Real Estate
thread.title: S.Korea to designate key shipbuilding regions as 'industry crisis' zones -Yonhap

title: S.Korea to designate key shipbuilding regions as 'industry crisis' zones -Yonhap
text:
May 29, 2018 / 12:30 AM / in an hour S.Korea to designate key shipbuilding regions as 'industry crisis' zones -Yonhap Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
SEOUL, May 29 (Reuters) - South Korean Finance Minister Kim Dong-yeon said on Tuesday the government will designate key shipbuilding centres on the southeast coast as “industry crisis” zones eligible for support, Yonhap news reported.
The areas will include Dong-gu in the city of Ulsan and Geoje-si of Kyong-nam province, home to heavy shipping and shipbuilding companies, according to Yonhap.
The report did not provide details of specific government support. Reporting by Cynthia Kim; Editing by Sam Holmes
